LightningComponentBundle.description: This component displays a single related list of a big object records

property.label: Icon name
property.name: iconName
property.description: Choose which icon to show next to the related list title, use the following link as a reference: https://www.lightningdesignsystem.com/icons/. For example, you can enter: 'standard:article'

property.label: Icon background color
property.name: iconBackgroundColor
property.description: Type the HEX color to use as a background for the choosed icon. For example, you can enter: '#FFFFFF'

property.label: Big Object API Name
property.name: apiName
property.description: Type the API Name of the related big object. For example, you can enter: 'Archived_Task__b'

property.label: Fields to display for each record
property.name: retrievedFields
property.description: Type the API name of the fields to display, separated by a comma. For example, you can type: 'Type__c,Email__c,Subject__c,Due_Date__c'

property.label: Number of records options
property.name: numberOfRecords
property.description: Type the options of the number of records to retrieve, separated by a comma. Those options will be displayed to the end-user in a picklist, to offer him the choice of how many records to retrieve. For example, you can type: '50,100,150'.

property.label: Display mode (large screens)
property.name: displayModeLarge
property.description: Choose the display mode for large screens

property.label: Display mode (medium screens)
property.name: displayModeMedium
property.description: Choose the display mode for medium screens

property.label: Display mode (small screens)
property.name: displayModeSmall
property.description: Choose the display mode for small screens
